doc:
Tom Adams (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Adams_(actor) 0 Anthony Frederick Charles "Tom" Adams (9 March 1938 – 11 December 2014) was an English actor with roles in adventure, horror and mystery films and several TV shows. He was best known for his role as Daniel Fogarty in several series of The Onedin Line. Anthony_Frederick_Charles_"_Tom_"_Adams ( 9_March_1938 – 11_December_2014 ) was an_English_actor with roles in adventure_,_horror_and_mystery_films and several_TV_shows .
